EVENT_BANNER_LABEL: Event Banner (Optional, use png or jpeg)
EVENT_TOURNAMENT_EMPTY_STATE: All your poker festivals will be listed under this tab. To create your first poker festival, just click on the “New Special Event” button.
EVENT_FINISHED_TOURNAMENT_EMPTY_STATE: Oops, it looks like we have currently nothing to display.
UPCOMING_TOURNAMENT_EMPTY_STATE: Click on the “+” button in the table below to create your first tournament.
RUNNING_TOURNAMENT_EMPTY_STATE: Oops, it looks like we have currently nothing to display. Start a tournament from this festival and it will appear here.
FINISHED_TOURNAMENT_EMPTY_STATE: Oops, it looks like we have currently nothing to display. Finish a tournament from this festival and it will appear here.
REMOVE_EVENT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this event ?
EDIT_BANNER_TEXT: Upload a new picture (jpeg or png file)
